title: Slow cooker venison, red wine and vegetable stew
ingredients: ['700g venison', '1 teaspoon thyme', '1 teaspoon rosemary', '3 tablespoons cornflour', '1 1/2 tablespoons tomato puree', '3 teaspoons Worcester sauce', '3 beef stock cubes', '187ml merlot red wine (small bottle)', '200g stew mix (lentils, green split peas, pearl barley)', '3 garlic cloves, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 parsnips', '3 carrots', '2 onions', '2 turnips', '2 sticks of celery', '1 leek', '1 courgette', '8 new potatoes, cut in half', '400ml boiling water']
